title: This Is Very Annoying
desc:
Post 956
# The entire point of this card is to be annoying to read. Instead of just spamming, I am going to put a plot summary of Hamilton. "Hamilton" is a groundbreaking Broadway musical by Lin-Manuel Miranda. It tells the story of Alexander Hamilton, a Founding Father, through hip-hop and traditional Broadway music. Hamilton rises from an immigrant to a key figure in America's formation. He aids George Washington, co-authors the Federalist Papers, becomes the first Secretary of the Treasury, and shapes the nation's financial system. This entire thing has been a prank. So here is what the card does. Draw 6. Get trolled. The show also explores his personal life, including relationships with his wife, Eliza, and her sister, Angelica. Hamilton's friendships and rivalry with Aaron Burr lead to a tragic duel. With a diverse cast, "Hamilton" revitalizes interest in history and showcases complex characters and themes. It highlights Hamilton's lasting impact on the United States. This cultural phenomenon has won awards and captivated global audiences with its unique blend of music, storytelling, and exploration of Hamilton's life. It is 160 minutes long, with one intermission. The lyrics and composition were both written by the star and creator of the show, Lin-Manuel Miranda. Credit to ChatGPT.
